entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: Oliver Wood is the Quidditch coach, as mentioned by his title and actions in the text.

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: Alicia Spinnet is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, introduced as one of the Chasers on Wood's team.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, introduced as one of the Chasers on Wood's team.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, introduced as one of the Chasers on Wood's team.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is a person mentioned in the text, specifically as saying that Oliver is a 'Spanking good Keeper'.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is a person mentioned in the text, specifically as saying that they think Oliver is very good too.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, introduced as the Seeker on Wood's team.
